title: Healthcare may be one of Nvidia's biggest future opportunities

Publisher - Global News Report  © Reuters Healthcare may be one of the biggest future opportunities for Nvidia (NVDA) – TD Cowen Healthcare could be one of the biggest future opportunities for NVIDIA (NVDA), according to analysts at TD Cowen. The company hosted Kimberly Powell, vice president of healthcare at NVIDIA, at its 44th annual healthcare conference, focusing on the “significant opportunity” to leverage AI across healthcare verticals, including drug discovery, medical devices and imaging, and digital health. According to TD Cowen, Nvidia (NASDAQ:) management called the digital transformation of the healthcare industry one of the largest and most data-intensive opportunities in technology. “In fact, the company estimates that healthcare revenue is already in excess of $1 billion (both direct and indirect) and that the market opportunity could reach tens of billions of dollars over time,” the bank wrote. “While this computing TAM would obviously not fully benefit NVIDIA, we believe the company is extremely well positioned to capture significant value over time as both R&D and capital expenditures across the vast global healthcare industry move toward generative AI -Computing will be relocated,” they added. TD Cowen argues that NVIDIA has significant opportunities in next-generation drug discovery, medical technology and digital health.
